reg_pit.title: Private Managed Forest Land Council Matters Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "Coast" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 137/2014, effective June 30, 2014.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Coast means that geographic area of British Columbia that is contained in the Coast Forest Region as defined in the Forest Regions and Districts Regulation, B.C. Reg. 123/2003;

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "domestic purpose", "licensed waterworks intake", "water users' community" and "waterworks purpose" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 41/2016, effective February 29, 2016.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: domestic purpose has the same meaning as under the Water Act;
licensed waterworks intake means a water intake that

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is to provide water for human consumption, and
is licensed under the Water Act for

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a waterworks purpose, if the licence is held by or is subject to the control of a municipality, regional district or improvement district, or
a domestic purpose, if the licence is held by or is subject to the control of a water users' community incorporated under the Water Act;

bcl:definition.bcl:text: water users' community has the same meaning as under the Water Act;
waterworks purpose has the same meaning as under the Water Act;
